title: Confronter - The Tower of Time
description:
Confronter is a first person shooter game featuring stunning high definition graphics with an intense storyline and engaging game play. YOU (armed with lethal weapons) have to combat armed enemies face to face.

The AI in this game is a bit off; it's no Crysis or FarCry 3, but it's still a neat little game.

Tested on Windows 7 32 & 64 bit OS (should work on Win 8.1)

Xpadder, with Xbox360 & PS3 profiles included.

This is a re-upload by request, since the game is very hard to get a hold of.


Screens:
 <a href="
http://bayimg.com/MaCllAAGG" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://bayimg.com/MaCllAAGG</a>

Features:

- 14 Missions 
- 9 Killer weapons 
- 8 Types of enemies before confronting the final enemy "BeastVaz". 
- Ingame Intro 
- High Quality 13 Music Tracks 
- Immersive ambient musics 
- Thrilling Sound Efects 
- Mesmerizing Visuals 
- Groundbreaking Graphics 
- Vast Structures 
- Gigantic Pillars, architectural structures 
- Realistic Water


Please seed for others
